content: I stumbled across a new marketplace called LibertyTown.orgFeatures:First decentralized (federated and distributed) marketplace. Anonymous Payments by using Pandora Cash ($PCASH).You can sell products and goods without the need of owning crypto.Secured for traders thanks to Multisig moderators.Search by keywords and rating score for each account.Encrypted p2p chat.Unstoppable being federative, distributed and decentralized.Your key, your products and your messages.Buy and Sell products now for crypto on LibertyTown.org. It doesn't cost you anything to sell products on LibertyTown. Join the crypto revolution and make some crypto.
